transArray.content: I arrived at the store late with my girlfriend, and within a few minutes after entering the room, the room suddenly lost power. The phone in the room couldn't get through, so I had to go downstairs to find the front desk. Although the attitude of the front desk was very good and the problem was quickly solved, it was the first time that I had to change the room in the middle of the night when I encountered such a sudden power failure in the room. I felt that the experience was very bad.
